sn47.33:1.1: “Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, cattaro satipatthana viraddha, viraddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn47.33:1.2: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, cattaro satipatthana araddha, araddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn47.33:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.33:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.33:2.6: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthana viraddha, viraddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami.
sn47.33:2.7: Yesam kesanci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthana araddha, araddho tesam ariyo maggo samma dukkhakkhayagami”ti.
